verses.name: 2 Kings 9:3
verses.text: Then take the box of oil, and pour it on his head, and say, Thus saith the Lord, I have anointed thee king over Israel. Then open the door, and flee, and tarry not.

verses.name: 2 Kings 9:4
verses.text: So the young man, even the young man the prophet, went to Ramoth–gilead.

verses.name: 2 Kings 9:5
verses.text: And when he came, behold, the captains of the host were sitting; and he said, I have an errand to thee, O captain. And Jehu said, Unto which of all us? And he said, To thee, O captain.
